My Projects

What do I do?

I love making fun little projects! I'm currently wokring on developing my HTML, CSS, and Javascript skills but I have done lots more in the past, including working with Arduino, Basic Stamp microcontroller, using scripts with Unity, and more! Click on each project for more info!

The Artkit Experience

A Hackathon project implementing HTML, CSS, Java and Firebase to inspire creativity and love for art.

Dance Dance Revolution

Rhythm game made with Unity, Arduino Leonardo, and...wood!

RC Whiteboard Eraser

A little robot made with Arduino, motors, and sensors to use in the classroom.
